description: This Vaddanam is a true masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship, blending traditional design with contemporary elegance. The use of high-quality diamonds, radiant emeralds, and pure gold creates a timeless piece of jewelry. The peacock motif symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it an auspicious choice for brides and special occasions. Its durable construction ensures it will be a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The emeralds are beautifully selected to provide striking contrast.
